uniequip_003_slent2.name: Plumes of Plenty
uniequip_003_slent2.EN: Allies with less than 50% HP within this unit's Attack Range heal HP equal to 5% of this unit's ATK every second; effect doubles for [Rhine Lab] Operators
uniequip_003_slent2.CN: 攻击范围内生命低于50%的友军每秒恢复相当于淬羽赫默攻击力5%的生命，【莱茵生命】干员的恢复效果翻倍

uniequip_003_mlyss.name: Expenditure Economization
uniequip_003_mlyss.EN: When in squad, all [Rhine Lab] Operators have -2 DP Cost, and the first Rhine Lab Operator deployed has an additional -1 DP Cost

uniequip_003_thorns.name: Nerve Corrosion
uniequip_003_thorns.EN: Poisons the targets when attacking, dealing 125 Arts damage to them per second, lasting 3 seconds (damage is doubled against Ranged enemies)
uniequip_003_thorns.CN: 攻击使目标中毒，在3秒内每秒受到125点法术伤害（对会远程攻击的目标伤害加倍）
uniequip_003_thorns.mod: 攻击使目标中毒，在3秒内每秒受到200点法术伤害（对会远程攻击的目标伤害加倍）。如果敌方单位处于<$ba.dt.neural2>神经损伤</>期间，中毒伤害变为2倍且类型改为元素伤害

uniequip_003_thorns.name: Nerve Corrosion
uniequip_003_thorns.EN: Poisons the targets when attacking, dealing 140 <@ba.talpu>（+15）</> Arts damage to them per second, lasting 3 seconds (damage is doubled against Ranged enemies)

uniequip_004_mizuki.name: Traumatic Hysteria
uniequip_004_mizuki.EN: Attacks deal an additional 50% of ATK as Arts damage to the target with the lowest HP
uniequip_004_mizuki.CN: 攻击时对攻击目标中生命值最少的敌人额外造成相当于攻击力50%的法术伤害

uniequip_004_archet.name: Landen Tactics
uniequip_004_archet.EN: Every 2.5 seconds when deployed, restores 1 Skill Point to all deployed Sniper allies that have an Offensive Recovery skill.
uniequip_004_archet.CN: 在场时所有【狙击】干员的攻击回复技能每2.5秒回复1点技力

uniequip_004_archet.EN: Every 2.5 seconds when deployed, restores 1 Skill Point to all deployed Sniper allies that have an Offensive Recovery skill.

uniequip_003_crosly.EN: Deals 20% more Physical damage to ground enemies that has not yet dealt damage to her

uniequip_002_angel2.name: 火力电台
uniequip_002_angel2.CN: 在场时，每当有友方干员的弹药被消耗就会回复自身6%生命值，并有25%概率立即对该干员攻击范围的敌人召唤一次轰炸，造成相当于自身攻击力150%的物理溅射伤害

uniequip_002_lemuen.name: 逃犯引渡手续
uniequip_002_lemuen.CN: 在场20秒后，攻击力+10%，自身弹药类技能弹药上限+1
uniequip_002_lemuen.mod: 在场20秒后，攻击力+15%，自身弹药类技能弹药上限+2

uniequip_002_lemuen.name: 逃犯引渡手续
uniequip_002_lemuen.CN: 在场20秒后，攻击力+10%，自身弹药类技能弹药上限+1
uniequip_002_lemuen.mod: 在场15秒后，攻击力+18%，自身弹药类技能弹药上限+2，其他拉特兰干员弹药类技能弹药上限+1

uniequip_002_rmixer.name: 扫射迎宾仪礼
uniequip_002_rmixer.CN: 每次造成伤害使自身10秒内防御力+30，攻击速度+3，最多可叠加3层
uniequip_002_rmixer.mod: 每次造成伤害使自身10秒内防御力+40，攻击速度+4，最多可叠加3层

uniequip_002_rmixer.name: 扫射迎宾仪礼
uniequip_002_rmixer.CN: 每次造成伤害使自身10秒内防御力+30，攻击速度+3，最多可叠加3层
uniequip_002_rmixer.mod: 每次造成伤害使自身10秒内防御力+50，攻击速度+5，最多可叠加3层；层数叠满时，使场上所有【拉特兰】干员的攻击速度不会低于战斗开始时的攻击速度
